description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉還路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
description.en: This course contents the introduction of control valve and controller, process dynamics, close loop control system, tuning of feedback controller, frequency response techniques, and cascade control system.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：1.解聯立方程式2.矩陣運算3.行列式4.向量空間5.線性轉換6.特徵值及特徵向量7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 1.電路元件2.電路特性3.網路方程式4.穩態分析及頻率響應5.網路函數：極點及零點6.雙埠網路分析7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.個人電腦（PC-486）之界面，3. 視窗作業系統，Visual Basic 及Borland C++ 3.1 語言，4.視窗應用界面(API)，動態脫結程式庫 (DLL)，動態資料交換 (DDE) 及物件連結崁入(OLE) 基本程式設計，5.客戶應用程式及服務者應用程式的架構設計，6.多媒體，影像壓縮和運動，7.簡介人工智慧，專家系統，Fuzzy 及 Neural 網路，8.圖形監控系統：A. IODDE, B. NETDDE, C. 物件導向圖控, D. 分散式控制網路，9.論文研討。
description.en: 1.introduction to personal computer interface.2.Windows operation system : V.B.or VC++.3.Program design for Dynamic link library (DLL).4.Program design for Dynamic Data exchange (DEE).5.Device Driver writing for windows :I.O.DDEand NETDDE.6.Multi-media and Virtual Reality Internet.7.Introduction to A.I.and Fuzzy-Neural Network .8.Object-Qriented graphic control user interface.

description.zh: 介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。1.嵌入式計算系統簡介2.指令集3.中央處理器4.嵌入式計算平台5.程式設計與分析6.程序與作業系統7.硬體加速器8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統9.系統設計方法
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop a comprehensive understanding of the basic concepts involving the design, development and deployment of embedded computing systems, using computing software and hardware as components. The course outline is as follows.1.An introduction to Embedded Computing System2.Instruction Sets3.CPUs4.The Embedded Computing Platform5.Program Design and Analysis6.Processes and Operating Systems7.Hardware Accelerators8.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems9.System Design Techniques

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 1. 緒論、2. 負載預測、3. 發電系統可靠度分析、4. 發電成本分析、5. 電力潮流計算與分析、6. 輸電系統可靠度分析、7. 自動化輸電系統擴展性規劃、8. 電力系統故障分析
description.en: The purpose of this course is to focus attention on 1. the overall process called power system planning and 2. the mathematical detail of various analytical tools. The nature of this course makes it a graduate-level lecture and it is opened for those who already have a basic understanding on power system.1. Introduction, 2.Load Forecasting, 3.Generation System Reliability Analysis, 4.Generation System Cost Analysis, 5.Power Flow computation and Analysis, 6.Transmission System Reliability Analysis, 7.Automated Transmission System Expansion Planning, 8.Faulty Analysis of Power System.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意聲學之性質，噪音對人類之影響，音源及音場，噪音量測及分析設備，聲音之量測，噪音位準、標準及規範，音響材料及結構，噪音控制之原理。
description.en: The Nature of Sound, Effects of Noise on People, Sound Source and Sound Fields, Instrumentation for Measurement and Analysis of Noise, Acoustical Measurements, Noise Criteria, Standards and Regulations, Acoustical Materials and Structures, Principles of Noise Control.

description.zh: 1.布林代數與邏輯閘  2.組合邏輯  3.同步循序邏輯  4.同步循序設計  5.非同步循序邏輯  6.非同步循序設計
description.en: This course offers students a basic concept about how to design a logic circuit. A couple of examples proposed in this course which have appeared repeatedly in the design of digital systems will be presented to illustrate the design concept.1.Boolean Algebra and Logic Minimization  2.Combinational Network Design  3.Analysis of Synchronous Sequential Networks  4.Design of Synchronous Sequential  5.Analysis of Asynchronous Sequential  6.Design of Asynchronous Sequential Networks

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。金屬表面電鍍、陽極處裡、熱浸塗覆與擴散塗覆、金屬熔射、化成塗覆、氣相化學層積、離子鍍及離子注入、合板包覆、磷酸鹽塗覆、搪瓷、表面性質測試。
description.en: The technology of Surface Treatment can be classified as follows:1.The fundamental of Electroplating theory and experiments.2.Physical processes and experiments.3.Chemical processes.4.Low temperature plasma techniques.5.Thermal spraying processes.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理簡介、快速原型系統簡介、Solid Model建立、3D實體建構、快速模具簡介、快速原型技術應用簡介。
description.en: Introduction to principle of rapid prototyping, Introduction to System of rapid prototyping, Building of Solid model, Building of 3D parts, Introduction to rapidtooling, Introduction to applications of rapid prototyping technology.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。齒輪應用的歷史、定義、分類及特殊輪齒、齒輪作用理論、齒輪之製作方法、齒輪損壞及負荷能力估算、齒輪潤滑、檢測等。
description.en: History of Gear Development, Definition, Classify, and Special Gear Profile, Principle of Gear Action, Gear Manufacture, Failure Type, Load Capacity Estimation, Gear Lubrication.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。系統匯流排（匯流排之時序、匯流排之負載及驅動能力）、序列系統介面（8251可程式通信介面）、平行系統介面（8251可式程式週邊介面）、A/D &D/A 介面、系統中斷 DMA(Direct Memory Access)介面 、通訊訊號介面（RS232、RS422、電流迴路）、區域性網路（區域性網路概論、區域性網路的使用方法、區域性網路方式及目的）、區域性網路的基礎技術、通訊線路及信號、資料交換規則、匯流排網路的特性及分析。
description.en: System Bus (Bus Timing, Bus Loading, Bus Driven), Serial Communication Interfaces (8251 Programmable Communication Interfaces), Parallel Communication (8255 Programmable Peripheral Interface), A/D & D/A Interface, Interrupt System, Direct Memory Access Controllers Communication Interface (RS232, RS422, Current Loop), Local Networks (Introduction of Networks Technology, Communication Circuit and Signals, Data Switching Techniques, Network Performance & Analysis).

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術. 本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題:1.近代光電量測系統與技術2.量測統計原理3.量測信號處理4.三次元座標量測系統與技術5.雷射干涉系統與技術6.影像量測系統與技術7.微奈米量測系統與技術-干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術8.微奈米量測系統與技術--掃瞄探針顯微鏡(SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9.奈米粉體量測系統與技術10.量測實驗11.小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

description.zh: 熱交換器應用、熱交換器設計簡介、熱傳分析、熱交換性能分析、熱交換器鰭片分析、熱交換器低溫應用分析
description.en: Applications of heat exchangers, introduction to heat exchanger design, heat transfer analysis, performance analysis of heat exchanger, analysis of heat exchanger fin design, analysis of low temperature applications

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 如何將材料創造出強度更高，延伸率，斷面收縮率，衝整值等耐強度更大之材料，除了調整合金元素外，如何應用熱處理之手段使材料達到所求之特性。對於各種熱處理之原理、解析及實際的應用作詳盡的介紹。隨著科技之發達，機械工業之進步、構造物之增大及精密化、迷你化之趨勢，金屬材料所要求之性質需要更進一步之強化，為滿足此一要求，除調整合金元素之外，必須賴適當的熱處理，才能發揮材料本身含有合金元素之功能，亦可滿足吾人所需之各種用途，本課程為使學生瞭解這些處理方法，由理論上說明熱處理與變態理論，及熱處理對強化機構上之理論根據，及熱處理之方法等，本熱處理課程內容有：1.金屬熱處理之基礎，各種組織與變態，平衡圖在熱處理上之應用，連續冷卻，恆溫冷卻，在熱處理之應用、鋼之淬火變態舉動，合金元素在材料上之影響，結晶粒之大小性質對熱處理之影響，鋼之硬化能之應用及計算方法。2.熱處理技術、鋼之加熱及各種熱處理方法。3.鋼之光輝熱處理，保護爐氣之種類及其管理方法。4.鋼之表面硬化熱處理。5.淬火零件之設計及材料之選擇。6.工具模具鋼、不銹鋼、鑄鐵、銅及鋁合金之熱處理。7.熱處理發生不良原因及其防止方法。
description.en: How to create a higher strength, elongation, percentage of area reduction, impactvalue material, except for adjusting alloy elements, it also utilizes heat treatmentmethod to achieve the property. Pinpoint to the theory ,analysis,practical applicaton of all kinds of heat treatment,,it would be detailly introduced by this course.

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 1.晶體結構與晶體生長 2.載體濃度與能階圖 3.載體傳輸,擴散,漂移 4.半導體的光電特性 5.pn接面分析
description.en: 1.crystal structures & crystal growth 2.energy-band diagrams & carrier densities 3.carrier    transport 4.optoelectronic properties of semiconductors 5.pn junctions

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維與管理知能，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域創新管理相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計創新管理相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, communication, leadership, strategy, globalization, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

description.zh: 本課程主要以講座、研習營方式探討及演練有關生活實用科技及創意產業化之原理與實作。內容包括：生活實用科技與應用、智慧財產權與管理、數位音像設計與行銷、商業經營模式與設計管理、本土化創作與品牌經營、創意產業化與行銷。
description.en: Theory and Professional Practice on Workshop Subjects for Cultural Innovation and Business Management: （1）Applied technology for New lifestyle.（2）Intelligence property and its positioning.（3）Design and Marketing for multi-media.（4）Interaction between Business model and Design Management.（5）Indigenous works on randay.（6）Innovation Implementation and Marketing.

name.zh: 流行家具設計專案研究
name.en: The Contemporary Furniture Design Project Research

description.zh: 流行家具設計專案包含家具流行趨勢研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward furniture design project focused on trend research and design practice under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive trend research.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

name.zh: 流行生活用品設計概論

description.zh: 講述知識性內容包括瞭解文化、趨勢、生活型態、科技發展等設計背景元素。介紹設計理論，深入探討產品與使用者之關係、產品使用情境與產品語言(product language)、環境因素與社會背景、產品診斷、以及非物質設計因素。
description.en: Lecture on culture study, trend, life-style and technology development. A Brief introduction to theory of design including impact of environmental factors and social background, product clinic, usability, and universal design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研究家具設計數位化的技巧，藉由各種相關軟體與自行建立Third Party的應用，完成家具設計案虛擬實境的效果，同時以家具設計個案的實際演練，達到家具設計師與客戶間的良好溝通與充分檢討。
description.en: This course aims to study the digital techniques for furntiure design. With the related software and self-made third party applications, the furntiure design project is conducted in the form of virtual-reality. Meanwhile, through the practicing of furntiure design projects the communication between designers and clients is emphasized.

name.zh: 流行時尚與產品人類學

description.zh: 以人類學觀點，從資本主義與文化消費社會形塑過程中，考察日常生活用品之流行時尚現象，包括文化消費、身體消費、影像消費、網路消費、時髦物體系、產品與主體建構、次文化認同、後現代認同等課題之理論介紹、案例分析與產品俗民誌實習。
description.en: From the viewpoint of anthropology, this course is to inquire the fashion phenomena of everyday commodities in the context of capitalism and the formation of cultural consumption.  The contents include the introduction of theories, the case studies, and the practices of product ethnography in the aspects of cultural consumption, body consumption, image consumption, internet consumption, systems of fashion objects, 3C products and subjectivity construction, subculture identity, and post-modern identity.

name.zh: 流行時尚族群行為研究

description.zh: 代表流行文化的流行時尚族群對生活物品的設計影響深遠。本課程針對此族群的生活型態、喜好度與期望性等因素，展開隨機性或系統性觀察，並配合訪談、問卷與實驗等研究步驟作資料收集。再經由資料分析（質化與量化兼具）與歸類，整理出流行時尚族群的興趣與傾向，作為流行生活用品設計的重要參考依據。
description.en: Fashion groups representing the popular culture widely affect the design of living artifacts. This study will focus on target groups' lifestyle, preferences and desirability to undertake casual and systematic observation. Additionally, the methods of face-to-face interviews, questionnaire and experiment are used to collect data and information and tend to be analyzed with the formation of qualitative and quantitative research. The final result will provide designers as guidelines, which might identify the target group's interest and preference.

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

name.zh: 生活資訊產品設計研究

description.zh: 隨著資訊科技的進步，資訊處理的功能被廣泛的加入到產品之中，成為典型的「互動系統」（Interaction System）。本課程重於使用者與資訊產品之間的互動介面設計。將探討到介面的使用是否容易；使用者是否能夠完成特定的工作等議題。討論的主題包括－認知模式、互動技術、符號系統、顯示螢幕的組織方式、以及數位原型建構方法。
description.en: With the progress of Information technology, the functions of information process have been added into appliance which is a typical interaction system. In the course, we will focus on issues related to interactive interface between information appliance and users. Those issues include cognition model, interactive technology, information architecture, and digital prototype.

name.zh: 流行辦公家具與空間設計研究
name.en: Special Topics in Contemporary Office Space and Furniture Re

description.zh: 從現代工作之型態去探討人、空間與家具之關係，並隨材料科技和加工技術的進步，研究現代辦公家具的趨勢及設計方向。
description.en: A general study of design trend of contemporary office furniture by examining modern work types and organization structures respectively. This course intends to utilize material improvement, new manufacturing technology and ergonomics studies to study the trends and directions of office space and furniture design.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

name.zh: 特殊群族產品開發管理與實務研究
name.en: Study of Product Development Management and Practice in Prod

description.zh: 工業設計近年經被定義為人本設計，並在產品設計開發中具橫向整合的功能。然而，在特殊群族如：傷殘、老人、幼兒等產品的設計開發，常需醫療、復健、醫工、觀護及幼兒教育等該群族相關專家及專業人員的參與。本課程重點在於輔導研究生，研究與分析工業設計在該類產品設計開發中，與相關群族之專業專家之互動關係、工作及活動內容、及如何將該等工作內容有效整合於產品設計開發管理中，並作實務研究與探討。
description.en: Industrial Designer is designing products with users oriented. But designing product for the special user's group. As disable, elder and children (Infant) are mostly has been involved by specialist that has expertise on their nature.The goal of this topic is to assist Students in study and research of the relationship, activities, and their interaction between Industrial Design and the specialist which concerning the related users group. And how to integrate them into product development function, In design management and practice.

description.zh: 本課程旨在(一)探討中西傳統家具造型起源及演化；(二)研究影響各時期家具風格形成的因素，包括社會文化環境、使用材料、結構方法、裝飾手法及其象徵意義等；(三)探尋傳統設計元素在現代家具上的可能應用。
description.en: An in-depth exposure to the origins of form and the evolution of furniture design both in Oriental and Western World; Comprehensive analysis of the characteristics, including specific cultural environment, material used, construction methods, ornamentation, and Symbolism in decoration which define a period style; Study the application of traditional design elements on contemporary furniture.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 電力科技之改革2. 世界各國電力自由化發展3. 電力交換組織架構4. 獨立系統操作組織架構5. 電力庫制度6. 損失計算7. 電價計算
description.en: 1. Revolutions of power Technologies2. The development of deregulation in the world3. Organization of power exchange4. Organization of independent system operator5. power pool6. Power wheeling7. Calculations of losses8. Calculations of electric prices

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en: Course Title:Mechatronics PracticeDescription:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronictechniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage powerdistribution systems.

description.zh: 前言、DSP 架構、指令、定址法乘法加法、量化誤差、假信號FIR 濾波器、濾波器設計
description.en: IntroductionDSP architectureInstructionsAddressing modeMAC instructionsQuantization errorAliasingFIR filtersFilter design

description.zh: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: (1)電腦數字系統 (2)8088系列組合語言 (3)8088系統接線、時序、及故障排除 (4)8088中斷及中斷應用 (5)數位介面 (6)各種記憶體 (7)DMA資料傳輸。
description.en: Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程專為主修非生命科學領域的大專學生所設計，透過日常生活常見的現象，介紹生物學幾個主要學門領域的概念，使學習者能夠瞭解生物學知識在生活中的應用。課程以講解、簡易實驗操作、討論和分組報告進行，包括：細胞學、生物技術、人體構造功能、植物構造與功能、生態學。課程的重點在於生物相關訊息的蒐集、理解、資料整理、判讀，希望能夠建立學生接觸非主修領域知識的習慣，有更廣泛和自由的思維。
description.en: This course is designed for non life science major students. Through events usually occur in everyday life, we will explore the relationship between Biology and our daily life. The goal of the course is to create an environment which lets students contact with the field with which they are unfamiliar, and to understand it with interest. Course activities include : lectures, group discussion, simple experiments. The important topics of the course include : cell, biotechnology, human health, horticulture.

description.zh: 素描是一切繪畫基礎，設計產品，有美的意念，還要有能力將之畫出來，才算完成，否則即成空泛理論。(一)鉛筆練習：線條方向、明暗度變化、立體概念、光影效果等。(二)方形器物練習：以平移法正確掌握立方體造形，並將明暗效果表現出來。(三)圓柱體練習：畫易開罐飲料罐，能繪出其質感效果和細部文字、圖樣。(四)圓形物練習：能把握造形、質感、量感、光澤，以水果為練習對象，如蘋果、橘子等。(五)多種形體練習：如松果、貝殼、落葉等，均能把握其造形、質感、光影特色。由完全沒有概念開始，訓練至有寫生能力，也學得耐心、細心和觀察力。
description.en: Sketch is the base of painting. The product design and concept of beauty must be expressed; otherwise, it will become only a talk.Contents:1.Pencil practicing: lining, chiaroscuro, cubism, lighting, etc.2.Square ware practicing: controlling the cubism styling with a horizontal movement, also, expressing chiaroscuro, etc.3.Cylinder practicing: drawing beverage can with the sense of its quality, detail, and picture.4.Round object practicing: styling, quality, quantity, luster; also, drawing fruit, such as, apple, orange, etc.5.Multiple-shape practicing: such as, pin cines, shell, falling leaves with the sense of styling, quality, lighting, etc.The course is to train students who have are inexperienced to sketch with the ability of patient, detailing, and observation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是使學習者：具備科學發展史的基本知識；認識科學研究的方法與態度；知道目前科學理論下的宇宙形成、發展、與未來；認知生命科學和物理科學對人類生活互動關係；具備現代人類所應具備的科學素養。
description.en: This course will have some effects for students that learn the basic knowledge of development historic science, and study the methodology and attitude of science research, know the formation, development, and future of universe in science theories at the present day, cognize the interactions of the life science and physics science to human existence, have got the scientific literacy of the be of modern human.

description.zh: 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。
description.en: From the early aboriginal society to the immigrant society of the Hans and even to the current society, songs--in different period of times--always play an important role in civil life. In traditional society, folksongs perform the functions of instruction, religion and entertainment. A large number of folksongs serve the gateway to understand the common people.  Though today's pop-songs are the products of entertainment business, they still reflect common people's emotions and values as well as label the mark of social change.  Taiwanese songs (including folksongs and pop-songs) are important texts in this course. Through the analysis of the song lyrics, the students are expected to draw a vivid picture of the social change in the past.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

name.en: An exploration of the place-names in Taiwan

description.zh: 「台灣」的名稱很可能是由「埋冤」或「埋完」的閩南語演變而來的（台灣的「灣」，本地人均唸第二聲，音如「完」或近「冤」，而不唸原字該唸的第一聲）。早期在台灣幾乎到處可見的「御使崎」地名，其實是緣自當時最普遍的運輸工具「牛車」而來的特殊景觀。  「地名」通常可顯示出當地地形、地物或地貌景觀的特徵。也可能代表了當地特殊的地理現象，更可能隱藏著台灣先民許多胼手胝足、可歌可泣的傳奇和拓荒血淚史。而幾個地名串連起來，也許就訴說了一條我們祖先從閩粵來台，由登陸、轉進、開發以至於定居的路線。  一個地方怎麼會以虐待動物的「打狗」、「打貓」為名？「貴子坑」為何有好多「鬼」故事？基隆為什麼原稱「雞籠」呢？沙鹿、初鹿、鹿草、鹿野、鹿谷、鹿港……等，這麼多地方以「鹿」為名，究竟那裡有鹿？那裡沒有鹿？如果沒有鹿，怎麼會以「鹿」為名呢？南投在南、北投在北，當然是天經地義的事，可是北港在南，南港卻在北，如何令人心服口服呢？台北、台南、台中、台東都有，為什麼獨缺「台西」縣市呢？  總之，台灣地名的來由，真是琳琅滿目、數之不盡，有知識性的，也有趣味性的；有文獻記載的，也有口耳相傳的，請讓我快快道來……。
description.en: The place-names in Taiwan not only tell us the forms of the land, and the superficies of the ground, but also reveals the special geographical phenomena, and much further, the hardship and legendary of our ancestors.The name "Taiwan" could be evolved from the slang - "bury the grievance" or "bury it all" in Taiwanese.  Some places have merciless names such as "thrash the dog", "thrash the cat".  What is the reason that Keelung was ever called "chicken cage"?  We can find many places were named with "deer" in Taiwan, but we cannot see any deer in some of these places today.  I believe that it will be very difficult to convince our people that BeiGang (north port) is in the South and NanGang (south port) is in the North！Altogether, the stories of the place-names in Taiwan are countless and in variety, some of them are knowledgeable, and some are amusing; there are also some from the literature, and some are from legend. The main idea of this course is to help us looking into how various

name.en: Changes and Development in the Taiwan Economy

description.zh: 一個社會的經濟發展造成社會結構的改變，整個社會的政治參與程度也隨之提高。台灣經齋發展提供了政治民主化和價值多元化觀念孕育的環境。這個舉世公認的經濟成就是如何締造的？本課程將以學術理論深入分析她的發展策略，解析這數十年來經濟變遷與發展的過程，以及所呈現的目題癥結與特徵，並尋求它的解決之道與未來發展的正確方向。
description.en: The economic development of a society tends to result in the transformation of its social structure and an increase in the political participation of its people. The economic development of the Taiwan economy has provided an environment contributing to political democratization and multi-valued concepts. How has this well-recognized economic development been established ? This course aims at exploring development strategies in depth, based on theories , analyzing the process of transformation and development of the Taiwan economy in the past several decades. Examining problems caused by this transformation the developing process and their characteristics , and seeking potential solutions and right directions for the future Taiwan economic development will also be examined.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹西洋各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，解說各時代之繪畫風格，重要畫家，以及著名建築、雕刻、手工藝等，以幻燈教學，使學生瞭解西洋藝術，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括: 1.史前藝術：包括洞窟藝術、骨雕石雕等。2.上古藝術：如西亞、埃及、希臘、羅馬、波斯、印度等線畫、雕刻、建築。3.中世紀藝術：拜占廷、東羅馬藝術。4.文藝復興：包涵繪畫、雕刻建築、壁畫等。5.十七、八世紀：巴洛克、洛可可時代。6.近代繪畫：如新古典主義、浪漫派、印象派等。7.現代藝術：野獸派、立體派、超現實主義、象徵主義、抽象派、達達派、普普、歐普、新寫實、未來派、構成派等畫派之繪畫。
description.en: The contents of this course are constructed as following :1.Prehistoric Art : including"The Art of Engraving ", "Carving designs on bone ","Carving designs on stone "..etc. 2.Previous Ancient Art: For instance, the painting engraving architecture of Siya, Egypt, Greece, Rome, Persia, India.etc 3.Art of Middle Ages: Art of Byzantine, Art of Rome. 4.Renaissance: including Painting, Engraving, architecture, fresco etc. 5.Seventeenth and Eighteenth Centuries: Periods of Baroque. Rococo. 6.Modern Painting: for instance, Neoclassicism. Romanticism. Impressionism etc. 7.Contemporary Art: The painting of fauve, Cubism, Surrealism, symbolism, Abstract Art, Dada, Pop Art, Op Art, Neorealism, Futurism, Formalism…etc. The interpretation will include styles of different period, important artists, famous architectures, engraving handicrafts and so on. The Slides will be used as a teaching assistance to help students understand Western Art.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會民主法治觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課擬從以下方向發展：１．中國歷代政治得失評析：一個治亂興亡的觀點。２．現階段政府所面對的政治、經濟、社會與文化等挑戰３．實際憲政制度之運作對台灣政治發展之影響。４．政治文化與政治社會化研究。５．立憲民主政府的主要類型比較。６．民主憲政與人權保障探源。７．政治參與－政府機關對人民的政治活動。８．民主國家國會結構比較研究。９．從總統委任直選到總統直選－理論與實際。10．現代政治中行政與立法的關係。11．司法正義與司法革新。12．政治發展與政治穩定。
description.en: This course is intended to help students understand the constitutional development of Taiwan, and the relation between tradition and modern period so as to establish democratic concepts in this multi-cultural society.  This course will study the basis of our Constitution, and explore the following items: 1. the Chinese political development 2. what the challenge our government is facing at the present time 3. the consequence and impact of Constitution operation 4. the political culture and political sociology 5. comparison among various constitutional governments 6. democratic systems and human rights 7. political participation--state vs civil society 8. comparisons of the congress of democratic countries 9. theory and practice of the Presidential election systems 10. relation between the executive Yuan and legislation  11. judicial justice and judical reform 12. political development and steadiness.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en: Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators, synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 1.雙極性電晶體 2.蕭特基接面 3.MOS結構 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS電路及製程 6.各種IC技術
description.en: 1.bipolar junction transfors 2.metal-semiconductor junctions3.MOS structors 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS circuits & processes 6.ICfabrication technologies

description.zh: 一.發展商務決策系統，包括：1.DSS架構 2.DSS硬體 3.DSS軟體 4.DSS模式 5.GDSS模式 二、資料倉儲 三、智慧型代理人 四、資訊分享 五、OLAP 六、OLTP 七、Sales force automation
description.en: Development and application of decision support systems for commerce including DSS architecture, hardware, software tools, models in DSS and group DSS. Recent development and application of intelligent systems including data warehousing, intelligent agent, information sharing, on-line analysis processing and sales force automation using Web technologies. Development of an intelligent commerce system using Microsoft SQL Server.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 21世紀是知識經濟的時代，唯有知識是個人及組織(含企業及國家)持續成長的核心能力，工科研究所以上的學生除了要具備技術面臨新經濟的挑戰外，也應對本科技術外的各種知識領域深入瞭解，並能予以駕馭，即時掌握時機發揮智慧的潛力，開創成功的事業及美好的人生。其課程內容含指：1.基本原理(新經濟模型)2.新經濟的管理理論3.辦認新經濟潛力4.降低不確定性5.動態競爭分析6.生產力分析7.技術智慧資本8.新興經濟體的創新9.專技人員自我管理。
description.en: The power of knowledge is the only core-competence for both individuals and organizations )include：enterprise and country) to maintain continuing growth during the coming 21st century-the ERA of knowledge economy.For the graduated students in engineering school, the program of knowledge economy management bring them new concept and lead them to keep and handle any opportunity to approach their life goal and to deal with their future carrier planning. The program include：1.fundamentals (models of knowledge) 2.theories of knowledge economy 3.recognizing the potential of knowledge economy 1.reducing uncertainty 5.dynamic competitive 6.productivity analysis 7.technical intelligence capital 8.innovation of Emerging Economies 9.knowledge worker's self-management.

description.zh: 本課程之重點在於將熱力學機基本定律,應用於較為實際的化工問題上.主要內容包括:熱力學及輸送現象性質之估算方法,氣液相平衡及液液相平衡在分離製程的應用等.
description.en: The objectives of this course are to apply principles of thermodynamics in practical chemical processes. The contents of the curricula are 1) estimation of the thermodynamic and transport properties of fluids and solids, 2) vapor-liquid equilibrium as well as liquid-liquid equilibrium for separation processes application.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.
